permissions: Admin users can delete sets. Managers can delete sets for their brokers. Operations users with manager business unit membership can delete template and non-template sets if they have at least one business unit. Operations users without manager business unit membership can delete non-template sets only if they have at least one business unit. General and technician business unit members cannot delete sets.
validation_notes: --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if the set has associated maintenance requirements.
